oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Nona Atlantic Davidson with news of her son's death
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to "Mistress Davidson" from J. G. Kelly, R. D. Anderson, and R. H. Boyers, detailing the sickness and death of Mrs. Davidson's son, Garrett Dallas Davidson. Davidson died of measles while training at Camp Trousdale.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
